official_title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 respecting the maximum allowable exposure of persons to radiation.

summary.text: Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to direct the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to include exposure of persons to medical radiation from sources not required to be licensed under the Act in determining the maximum allowable exposure to radiation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 respecting the maximum allowable exposure of persons to radiation.
